meanings.definition: The lower part of a person's or animal's jaw.
meanings.sent1: The underjaw helps us chew our food.
meanings.sent2: The dentist examined the underjaw of the dog.
meanings.sent3: The underjaw of the cat wiggled comically as it meowed.
meanings.sent4: Her underjaw was like a sturdy bridge supporting her face.
meanings.sent5: The underjaw of the lion looked powerful and intimidating.

meanings.definition: To have a prominent or protruding underjaw.
meanings.sent1: He underjaws when he is concentrating deeply.
meanings.sent2: She noticed that the actor underjaws when delivering lines.
meanings.sent3: The baby underjaws cutely when trying to speak.
meanings.sent4: His underjaw protrudes like a rock formation in the desert.
meanings.sent5: The underjaw of the bulldog underjaws noticeably compared to other breeds.
